title: Жила-была одна баба
overview: A five-part television version of the 2011 television film of the same name.The series tells the dramatic story of a Tambov peasant woman during the Revolution and Civil War. Through the prism of her life, the fate of the Russian village, drawn into the peasant uprising led by Alexander Antonov, which broke out in the Tambov province and went down in history as the "Antonovshchina", is shown, as well as the fate of the entire country and the bloody pages of its history.
